rgi_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to a single outline.

o1region.description: The code of the first-order region to which the glacier belongs.

o2region.description: The code of the second-order region to which the glacier belongs.

glims_id.description: Non-unique identifier assigned to glaciers by the Global Land Ice Measurements from Space service at NSIDC.

anlys_id.description: The unique identifier assigned within GLIMS for a particular outline of a glacier at a particular time.

subm_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by GLIMS to a specific data submission. Allows to obtain information about the analysts and data submitters.

src_date.description: The as-of date for the outline (usually the acquisition date of the image), in the format ISO 8601.

cenlon.description: Longitude of an approximately central point within the glacier outlines (not the centroid).

cenlat.description: Latitude of an approximately central point within the glacier outlines (not the centroid).

utm_zone.description: Number of the UTM zone for this glacier, based on its representative point. Note that this attribute is for information only, the geometries are all in WGS84.

primeclass.description: WGMS primary classification of the glacier. For a categories description, see user guide.

conn_lvl.description: Level of connection to the Greenland Icesheet (0: no connection; 1: weak connection).

surge_type.description: Flag indicating if surging behavior has been documented for this glacier. For a categories description, see user guide.

term_type.description: Flag indicating the terminus type of the glacier. For a categories description, see user guide.

is_rgi6.description: Flag indicating if the outline is the same as in RGI 6.0 (1) or was remapped (0). Note that it does not guarantee strict equivalence of the polygon (in most of the cases it does).

termlon.description: Longitude of the lowest elevation point on the glacier outline.

termlat.description: Latitude of the lowest elevation point on the glacier outline.

zmin_m.description: Minimum elevation (m above sea level) of the glacier.

zmax_m.description: Maximum elevation (m above sea level) of the glacier.

zmed_m.description: Median elevation (m above sea level) of the glacier.

zmean_m.description: Mean elevation (m above sea level) of the glacier.

slope_deg.description: Mean slope of the glacier surface.

aspect_deg.description: The aspect (orientation) of the glacier surface presented as an azimuth relative to 0° at due north.

aspect_sec.description: The aspect (orientation) of the glacier surface presented as a category. For a categories description, see user guide.

dem_source.description: The name of the dataset that was used to compute the topography attributes.

lmax_m.description: Length (m) of the longest surface centerline of the glacier.
